detail_desc: Jersey sports joggers with an elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and tapered legs with seams at the back.
Loose-fitting, sports vest top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Slightly longer at the back.
Long earrings in hammered metal. Length 7 cm.

Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, flap front pockets and long sleeves with a wide, adjustable tab at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, and a high slit at the back, which can be made shorter with the help of two concealed press-studs. Lined.
Short, relaxed-fit shorts in softly draping silk with covered elastication at the waist and rounded hems with lace sections at the sides.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
Fabric laptop case with a chunky zip, one outer compartment and two inner compartments in big hole mesh. Size 1x24x33 cm. Fits laptops up to 13”.

Shirt in an airy weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and covered elastication at the hems. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with press-studs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with roll-edge tops.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey made from a linen blend with a deep V-neck at the back and straight-cut hem.

Short, straight-cut shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Imitation leather mules with adjustable straps with metal buckles. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide polo-neck top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, a zipped chest pocket and flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tab and elastication at the cuffs, folded seams and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Fitted shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of jeans. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey. 5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke, side pockets and an elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, a pair of glittery shorts and a pair of tights in soft, fine-knit cotton. Top with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and frills on the shoulders. Shorts with a fake fly, button at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems. Embroidery at the front and on one back pocket.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in different colours of washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shorts in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional yarn with elasticated tops.

Short, sleeveless, halterneck dress in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck and long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a flared skirt. Lined.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.

Studio Collection. The little black number in grand style, overlayered with dramatic, large flounces. Made in a slightly shimmering weave, the dress has a double-layered chest section decorated with flounces in various designs, and a frill-trimmed placket at the top with concealed buttons. The wide pleats front and back add structure and life. Overdimensioned sleeves with a wide flounce that winds all the way down to the cuffs, and wide, buttoned cuffs with a high-cut opening. Lined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Fitted blouse in an airy viscose weave with a smocked bodice and square neckline with a small frill trim and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with frill trims.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication, and short, wide legs.
Ankle boots with a tongue and lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 2.8 cm.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck with a gathered seam.
Imitation suede mules with open toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Set with a T-shirt in soft jersey and leggings in superstretch denim. T-shirt with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs. The jeans are made of COOLMAX® material that is designed to keep you cool in hot weather.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Soft faux fur slippers with appliqués and embroidery on the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Dance leggings in microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.

Puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a ring pull and a chin guard at the top, and flap front pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a soft pile lining. Hood with a decorative drawstring, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ballerina neckline and extra-long sleeves.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an embroidered motif on the front, crossover straps at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Trainers in chambray with a hook and loop fastening and bow at the top. Patterned fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved tunic in soft jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and 3/4-length sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam under the bust, detachable tie belt and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover.

Blouse in sturdy cotton denim with buttons down the front and a wide, rounded collar with a small frill trim. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The cotton content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Soft trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
